articles.author: Hayden Vernon
articles.title: Russian minister’s claim Ukraine war ‘launched against us’ met with laughter - The Guardian
articles.description: Sergei Lavrov says Moscow ‘trying to stop’ war in remarks at India’s Raisina Dialogue conference
articles.content:
Comments by Russias foreign minister, Sergei Lavrov, were met with laughter at an international conference in India, when he said that the Ukraine war had been launched against his home country.
Spe… [+1723 chars]
